description:
The school festival is a roaring success! At the swim team`s live stage show, Umihara and Kawase perform with Mafuyu in a Full Pure costume for some reason.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Matsuri no Sawagi wa Tomarazu [x] Domo wa Ibara no Michi o Iku
X Treads a Thorny Path as the Festivities Continue...
祭の騒ぎは留まらず[x]どもは茨の道を往く
